org.nasdanika.common.resources

Interface Container<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - Element type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Resource<E>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BinaryContainer, BinaryEntityContainer, EntityContainer<C,E>, ResourceContainer<E>, TypedEntityContainer<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinaryContainerImpl, ContainerFilter, EphemeralBinaryEntityContainer, EphemeralEntityContainer, FileSystemContainer, MapContainer

    public interface Container<E>
extends Resource<E>
    Container of entries and other containers provides an abstraction for dealing with hierarchies/trees. While a container does not necessarily have an out-of-JVM representation it extends Resource for convenience because these two interfaces share common characteristics.
    Author:
    Pavel

        E get(String path,
      ProgressMonitor monitor)
        Parameters:
        path -
        Returns:
        Element at the path or null if the element does not exist, is not created on access, or it would not be possible to create such an entity, e.g. a container with this path already exists, or one of path elements is not a container.

      • getContainer

        Container<E> getContainer(String path,
                          ProgressMonitor monitor)
        Returns a container for a given path. It is a logical operation - the container doesn't have to exist.
        Parameters:
        path -
        Returns:
        Container instance or null if it would not be possible to create such a container, e.g. an element with this path already exists or one of path elements is not a container.

      • getChildren

        Map<String,Object> getChildren(ProgressMonitor monitor)
        Lists existing children.
        Returns:
        A list of existing children. May return null for containers where children can't be retrieved, e.g. write-only containers.

      • copy

        default <F> void copy(Container<F> target,
                      Container.Copier<E,F> copier,
                      ProgressMonitor monitor)
        Recursively copies children to another container.
        Type Parameters:
        F - Element type of the other container.
        Parameters:
        container - Target container.
        copier - Copier of elements, converting type, and merging with the existing element if it is present. The first argument is element being copied, the second is an existing element or null if there is no such element.
        monitor - Progress monitor

      • move

        default <F> void move(Container<F> target,
                      Container.Copier<E,F> copier,
                      ProgressMonitor monitor)
        Recursively moves children - copies and then removes.

      • adapt

        default <F> Container<F> adapt(BiFunction<String,? super E,F> adapter,
                               BiFunction<String,? super F,E> converter)
        Adapts to a different element type.
        Type Parameters:
        F - Element type to adapt to
        Parameters:
        adapter - Adapts element E to target type F. Takes element path and the element itself.
        converter - Converts element F to E on put and get with a factory. Takes element path and the element itself.
        Returns:

      • load

        default void load(ZipInputStream zipInputStream,
                  Predicate<String> filter,
                  Container.Copier<InputStream,E> contentLoader,
                  ProgressMonitor progressMonitor)
           throws IOException
        Loads entries from a ZipInputStream into this container. This method used getXXX() methods to obtain container children. If getXXX() method returns null of if Entity entry is not null and canWrite() returns false then an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        zipInputStream - ZipInputStream.
        filter - Entry name filter. Can be null.
        contentLoader - Converts input stream to the element type. The first argument is the path.
        progressMonitor - Progress monitor.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • store

        default void store(ZipOutputStream zipOutputStream,
                   String prefix,
                   Container.Copier<E,InputStream> contentSerializer,
                   ProgressMonitor progressMonitor)
            throws IOException
        Stores children of this container to a ZipOutputStream.
        Parameters:
        zipOutputStream - Zip output stream. This method does not close the stream.
        prefix - Optional path prefix.
        contentSerializer - Converts entity state to the input stream. If null then DefaultConverter.INSTANCE is used to convert content to InputStream
        progressMonitor - Progress monitor.
        Throws:
        IOException
